_doc.frontend_id: Used by frontend to select/workflow; not used by backend router
_doc.title: Display title (frontend)
_doc.label: Short label (frontend)
_doc.celery_task: Logical workflow key; also used to build default task_name if task_name is not provided (backend task_router)
_doc.task_name: Optional explicit Celery task dotted path (e.g., workflows.raptool_task.raptool_task). If omitted, router derives workflows.{celery_task}.{celery_task}
_doc.queue: Optional Celery queue to send the task to. If omitted, router lets Celery route per task declaration
_doc.notes: Free-form notes for maintainers; ignored by code

workflows.title: toxindex-rap
workflows.label: ToxIndex RAP
workflows.description: Retrieval-augmented agent for evidence-backed chemical toxicity assessment.

workflows.title: toxindex-vanilla
workflows.label: ToxIndex Vanilla
workflows.description: Direct OpenAI LLM answer (no schema, no retrieval).

workflows.title: toxindex-json
workflows.label: ToxIndex JSON
workflows.description: OpenAI LLM answer formatted as JSON schema.

workflows.title: toxindex-heatmap
workflows.label: heatmap
workflows.description: Combines insights from prediction, metabolism and pathway analysis to provide a comprehensive toxicological assessment of chemical compounds.
workflows.initial_prompt: what chemical are you interested in?
workflows.notes: Processed by RAPtool worker pod built from Dockerfile.raptool; main backend does not import RAPtool

workflows.title: toxindex-pathway
workflows.label: Pathway Analysis
workflows.description: Analyze and visualize pathway data using WikiPathways and Cytoscape integration.
workflows.initial_prompt: Enter pathway ID (e.g., WP3657) or upload data file

workflows.title: toxindex-smiles
workflows.label: SMILES Extraction
workflows.initial_prompt: Upload a file containing chemical structures.

workflows.title: toxindex-ranking
workflows.label: Hazard Ranking
workflows.description: Workflow that ranks chemicals based on user-specified endpoints
workflows.initial_prompt: Upload a text file of of InChI's and an endpoint to be ranked by
workflows.notes: Add task_name/queue when task is implemented

workflows.title: toxindex-sygma
workflows.label: sygma
workflows.description: Workflow that ranks chemicals based on user-specified endpoints
workflows.initial_prompt: Upload a text file of of InChI's and an endpoint to be ranked by
workflows.notes: Add task_name/queue when task is implemented

workflows.title: SPARQL
workflows.label: SPARQL
workflows.description: Workflow that fetches chemicals from SPARQL endpoint
workflows.notes: Add task_name/queue when task is implemented

workflows.title: buildKE
workflows.label: buildKE
workflows.description: extract key events from a pdf
workflows.initial_prompt: extract key events from a pdf
workflows.notes: Add task_name/queue when task is implemented

workflows.title: affinity
workflows.label: Binding Affinity
workflows.description: Calculate binding free energy (Î”G) for protein complexes using MM/GBSA
workflows.initial_prompt: Upload PDB complex files and metadata to calculate binding affinity
workflows.notes: MM/GBSA binding affinity calculation with GPU support (OpenCL)
